titles.title: For the relief of Billy I. Meyer.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 9/12/1994--Introduced. Waives the time limitations with respect to a claim for the disbursement of pay due by the Department of the Army to a named individual as represented by checks issued to, but not negotiated by, him during the period beginning on January 16, 1981, and ending on September 21, 1984.
